descriptionlist.description: My attempt at making virtual home iOS 10 - 13 compatible (Tested on iOS 10 only).
Make sure to enable Reachability in Settings (General > Accessibility > Reachability) or install a tweak that force enables it.

changelog.change: Fix Apple not disabling sensor on some devices after screen being turned off causing actions to be invoked.
Fix action disabling in applications for iOS 13+ (still broken on lockscreen).
